author: imario
msg: VFS-51 - fixed handling of rootFile for localFileSystem to make it correctly work again with temporary fileSystem

author: andreask
msg: updated policy to be in line with permissions granted for derbyclient.jar in derby_tests.policy. Follow-up to DERBY-1545. This should enable running the server host on a remote machine when running the testProtocol test.

author: elecharny
msg: Modified the resource copy but swithing the filtering option to false, allowing a binary file to be copied. Thanks to maven, the 'resource' plugin has been updated in the last 5 months, and now break the build. Fixed
